comment.body: Would it be sensible to initialize them all to NULL....

pull_request.title: Strawman version of one-time fetching MD objects from OpenSSL
pull_request.body:
We need init them and free them in one place to avoid threading issues.

* [ ] Does this PR change the the list of algorithms available -- either adding, removing, or renaming? Does this PR otherwise change an API? comment.body:
First, in theory, they still may be NULL even if OQS_init is called - so checking OpenSSL DigestInit result is a good idea.

Second and worse, we will get a threading problem here.
